messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’m a mermaid drifting among the
waves...And a high-spirited gal who battles with
Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Losing...
Makes my tears well up.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE: A mermaid’s tears are so salty...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m still a mermaid drifting among the
waves...And a high-spirited gal who battles with
Pokémon!
